<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 119, 380, 146]]<|/det|> Cambridge IGCSE™ <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 170, 195, 185]]<|/det|> CANDIDATE NAME <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[91, 220, 160, 235]]<|/det|> CENTRE NUMBER <|ref|>table<|/ref|><|det|>[[210, 210, 424, 261]]<|/det|>
<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 277, 234, 294]]<|/det|> MATHEMATICS <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 302, 322, 318]]<|/det|> Paper 1 Non-calculator (Core) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[765, 302, 905, 317]]<|/det|> May/June 2025 <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[757, 326, 905, 341]]<|/det|> 1 hour 30 minutes <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 355, 395, 372]]<|/det|> You must answer on the question paper. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 384, 402, 401]]<|/det|> You will need: Geometrical instruments <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 418, 225, 432]]<|/det|> INSTRUCTIONS <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 435, 291, 450]]<|/det|> - Answer all questions. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 449, 761, 467]]<|/det|> - Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 464, 808, 481]]<|/det|> - Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 480, 565, 497]]<|/det|> - Write your answer to each question in the space provided. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 497, 478, 512]]<|/det|> - Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 511, 361, 528]]<|/det|> - Do not write on any bar codes. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 526, 452, 545]]<|/det|> - Calculators must not be used in this paper. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 542, 325, 559]]<|/det|> - You may use tracing paper. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 558, 468, 575]]<|/det|> - You must show all necessary working clearly. <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 603, 217, 618]]<|/det|> INFORMATION <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 618, 388, 635]]<|/det|> - The total mark for this paper is 80 . <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 634, 730, 651]]<|/det|> - The number of marks for each question or part question is shown in brackets [ ] .

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[430, 74, 567, 90]]<|/det|>
List of formulas

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 117, 680, 146]]<|/det|>
Area, \(A\), of triangle, base \(b\), height \(h\). \(A=\frac{1}{2} b h\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 170, 660, 188]]<|/det|>
Area, \(A\), of circle of radius \(r\). \(A=\pi r^{2}\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 219, 675, 235]]<|/det|>
Circumference, \(C\), of circle of radius \(r\). \(C=2 \pi r\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 267, 680, 284]]<|/det|>
Curved surface area, \(A\), of cylinder of radius \(r\), height \(h\). \(A=2 \pi r h\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 312, 543, 333]]<|/det|>
Curved surface area, \(A\), of cone of radius \(r\), sloping edge \(l\). \(A=\pi r l\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 361, 679, 380]]<|/det|>
Surface area, \(A\), of sphere of radius \(r\). \(A=4 \pi r^{2}\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 410, 490, 427]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of prism, cross-sectional area \(A\), length \(l\). \(V=A l\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 451, 435, 479]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of pyramid, base area \(A\), height \(h\). \(V=\frac{1}{3} A h\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 505, 421, 524]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of cylinder of radius \(r\), height \(h\). \(V=\pi r^{2} h\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 550, 396, 571]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of cone of radius \(r\), height \(h\). \(V=\frac{1}{3} \pi r^{2} h\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 599, 338, 620]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of sphere of radius \(r\). \(V=\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{3}\)
